basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli UB1005 (MIC=0.5 µg/ml), E. coli DC2 (MIC=1 µg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium (defensin-sensitive) (MIC=0.25 µg/ml), S. typhimurium (MIC=1 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa K799 (MIC=2 µg/ml), P. aeruginosa Z61 (MIC=1 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus SAP0017 (MIC=2 µg/ml), Staphylococcus epidermidis (MIC=1 µg/ml), Enterococcus faecalis (MIC=1 µg/ml).Yeasy:Candida albicans (MIC=4 µg/ml).
